# Commercial License (Template)

This project is available under a dual-licensing model:

- **Open Source License:** GNU Affero General Public License v3.0 or later (AGPL-3.0-or-later)
- **Commercial License:** available on request for proprietary use (no disclosure obligation)

## How to obtain a commercial license
Contact the author at:

- Email: amato.roberto.py@gmail.com

Please include:
- Company / organization name
- Intended use (product, SaaS, internal tool, etc.)
- Whether you need redistribution rights
- Expected deployment scale and timeline

## Disclaimer
This file is a template and not legal advice. You may want legal review.
